DOC.brief_summary: Animal , vitro small-scale study suggest creatine supplementation may augment bone mass . This clinical trial aim investigate effect 2-year creatine supplementation protocol bone mass postmenopausal woman .
DOC.criteria: healthy postmenopausal woman Tscore lumbar spine , femoral neck total femur 1SD 2.5SD drug dietary supplement may affect bone metabolism ( e.g. , bisphosphonates , AINEs , hormone replacement therapy , calcium , vitamin D , creatine supplementation ) low BMI ( < 18.5 Kg/m2 ) .
